- [ ] All tests pass. 
- [ ] Demo project builds and runs.

- [ ] I have followed the [coding style](https://github.com/jessesquires/HowToContribute#style-guidelines) and [contributing guidelines](https://github.com/jessesquires/HowToContribute).
